      • findDay

        public static java.lang.String findDay(int i)
        Return Day of Week based on given parameter. Used in fillExamDayArray()
        Parameters:
        i - The counter of the for loop at that time.
        Returns:
        Returns a String with the name of the Day selected, returns an empty text if i is wrong.

      • findTime

        public static java.lang.String findTime(int j)
        Return a Time Slot based on given parameter. Used in fillExamDayArray()
        Parameters:
        j - The counter of the for loop at that time.
        Returns:
        Returns a String with the Time Slot selected, returns an empty text if j is wrong.

      • findAvailableDayFromMonth

        public static java.lang.String findAvailableDayFromMonth(int i,
                                         java.util.ArrayList<com.models.Slots> slots)
        Find Available days from Slots ArrayList. Used in fillExamDayArray()
        Parameters:
        i - Position of the Day
        slots - An ArrayList containing the all available slots from slots.json file.
        Returns:
        Returns a String with the available day, in case something is wrong it returns an empty String

      • textFromBoolean

        public static java.lang.String textFromBoolean(boolean flag)
        Convert Boolean to Needed Text. Used in print()
        Parameters:
        flag - The boolean to check
        Returns:
        Returns "Non Available" if flag is true or "Available" if it is false.

      • generateCustomArray

        public static java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> generateCustomArray(java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> departments,
                                                        java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> semester,
                                                        boolean flag)
        Generate custom array containing concatenated Strings from both given ArrayLists.

        Used in constraint8()

        Parameters:
        departments - An ArrayList containing the Departments.
        semester - An ArrayList containing the Semesters.
        flag - Boolean to check if we want to return an ArrayList with concatenated Strings from departments and semester OR just return an ArrayList with departments only.
        Returns:
        Returns an ArrayList containing concatenated (or not) Strings.

      • checkLists

        public static int checkLists(java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> first,
             java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> second)
        Checks if second ArrayList contains data from first ArrayList

        Used in constraint6(), constraint8()

        Parameters:
        first - An ArrayList with the data to be checked if they exist.
        second - The ArrayList that will be checked.
        Returns:
        Returns a number that shows how many times an element from the first ArrayList existed in the second ArrayList

      • checkForDoubles

        public static int checkForDoubles(java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> arrayList)
        Check for same data inside an ArrayList

        Used in constraint7()

        Parameters:
        arrayList - The ArrayList to be checked.
        Returns:
        Returns a number that shows if there were any same data in the arrayList If there are no same data, it returns 0.
